articles.title: Colorectal cancer screening FAQs: Get tested for the ‘almost totally preventable’ disease - TCPalm
articles.description: Colorectal cancer will kill over 52,500 people in 2022, according to American Cancer Society projections. Here’s why you should start screening at 45.
articles.content:
March may be National Colorectal Cancer Awareness Month but as the third-leading cause of cancer-related deaths in men and in women in the United States, the disease doesnt mind the calendar.
